item.title: Explosion in Tula Region, Russia: Drone Loaded with Explosives Falls in Kiryevsk
item.description:
On March 26, 2023, an explosion occurred in the town of Kiryevsk, located 30 km from Tula, in the Tula Region of Russia. The explosion, which took place at 15:19 on Dorozhnikov Street 29, in the central part of the city, was caused by a drone loaded with explosives, possibly of Ukrainian origin.
The unmanned aerial vehicle, a Tu-141 "Swift", fell to the ground and created a massive crater, measuring 10-15 meters in diameter and 6-8 meters deep. The blast radius was approximately 500 meters, and the explosion shattered windows in nearby homes.
Reports indicate that three people were injured in the blast, including a 20-year-old man, a 36-year-old man, and a 17-year-old girl. Emergency services were quick to respond to the scene, and the injured were taken to a nearby hospital for treatment.
item.slugline: Explosion in Tula Region, Russia: Drone Loaded with Explosives Falls in Kiryevsk

media:content.media:title: Explosion in Tula Region, Russia: Drone Loaded with Explosives Falls in Kiryevsk

The unmanned aerial vehicle, a Tu-141 "Swift", fell to the ground and created a massive crater, measuring 10-15 meters in diameter and 6-8 meters deep. The blast radius was approximately 500 meters, and the explosion shattered windows in nearby homes.

item.title: Tommy the Cat's Snowy Adventure: A Hilarious Window Scratching Incident in Norway
item.description:
In Norway, the winter months can be harsh, with snowfall reaching up to several feet. It was on 25th December 2022, when Tommy, the adorable cat owned by @tommy_ogtigern, found himself in the middle of a snowstorm. His owner imagined what the feline might be thinking at that moment, "Help me, I’m drowning in snow out here."
Tommy, being a curious and adventurous cat, had gone out for a walk. After the walk he tried to find his way back to the house.
It was then that Tommy's signature habit kicked in. He started scratching the window with his paws to let his owner know that he wanted to come inside. The author of the video immediately went to help the cat and let him into the house.
item.slugline: Tommy the Cat's Snowy Adventure: A Hilarious Window Scratching Incident in Norway
